name: San Mateo County Pregnancy, Children and Families
description: San Mateo County's Family Health Services provides prenatal care, home visiting, and child health programs to support healthy pregnancies and child development for families throughout the county.
fullDescription: San Mateo County's Family Health Services provides prenatal care, home visiting, and child health programs to support healthy pregnancies and child development for families throughout the county.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free home visits for pregnant women and new parents
- Black Infant Health program
- Nurse-Family Partnership
- Child health and disability prevention
- Immunization services
- School-based health centers
- Dental services for children
- Services in English, Spanish, and other languages
howToGetIt: Call (650) 573-2501 for program information. Free for Medi-Cal recipients; sliding fee scale for other county residents based on income.
keywords: San Mateo, prenatal, pregnancy, home visiting, Black Infant Health, nurse family partnership, immunization, children's dental, school health, baby
